artist: Gabrielle Bell; Publisher: Gabrielle Bell, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
inscription: p. 1, black ink pen: Dear Fly; this is the SCARY one! / Do not read it late at night all alone ... Your #1 fan, Gabrielle Bell
life_date: Gabrielle Bell ; Gabrielle Bell, San Francisco, Publisher
medium: Color and black-and-white photocopy, bound volume
title: Book of Black
